user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for durable and comfortable workwear that I could rely on for everyday use.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a reliable and durable piece of clothing that could serve as both a standalone item and a layering option. The key attributes that attracted me were the high-quality fabric, the generous pocket for practicality, and the overall ruggedness that aligns with my work needs. My positive feelings towards the brand also played a significant role in my decision.

I needed a comfortable and durable t-shirt that could withstand regular wear and tear. The description highlighted the heavyweight fabric and the promise of increased softness over time, which appealed to my desire for long-lasting comfort. My previous positive experiences with the brand influenced my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, well-fitting, and made from high-quality materials. I appreciate items that offer a good balance of style and functionality, such as clothing that fits well and is versatile for different occasions. I also value brands that I trust and have had positive experiences with in the past. Additionally, I enjoy products that are easy to care for and maintain their quality over time. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that are poorly constructed, lack durability, or do not meet my expectations in terms of fit and comfort. I am not fond of products that require excessive maintenance or do not provide good value for money.
